description: FX Portfolio Trading Pipeline - Step Dependencies and Configuration

1.name: Exchange Rates
1.description: Fetch current exchange rates from API

3.name: News Aggregation
3.description: Fetch and store news articles from various sources
3.warning: Clearing news articles will require re-fetching from external APIs

4.name: Time Horizon Analysis
4.description: Extract time horizons from articles using LLM
4.warning: Uses LLM API - clearing will incur re-analysis costs

5.name: Sentiment Signals
5.description: Generate sentiment signals using keyword and LLM generators
5.warning: Uses LLM API - clearing will incur re-generation costs

6.name: Signal Realization
6.description: Check if signals have been realized (predicted events occurred)
6.note: Modifies signal files in-place (adds realized flag)

7.name: Trade Calculation
7.description: Calculate proposed trades with spread cost analysis

8.name: Portfolio Execution
8.description: Execute trades on portfolios and track values
8.warning: Portfolio state is cumulative - clearing resets all portfolio history!

9.name: Dashboard Deployment
9.description: Export data and deploy to GitHub Pages

exports: All step exports copied to dashboard

9.note: Deployment step - does not produce local data to clear

dependency_rules: Steps must be run in dependency order
Clearing a step requires clearing all downstream dependencies
Portfolio state (Step 8) is cumulative across dates
LLM-based steps (4, 5) incur API costs when regenerated
date_filtering: Portfolio execution (Step 8) maintains state across dates
Deployment (Step 9) always includes all available dates
safety_guidelines: Always clear downstream before clearing upstream (prevents orphaned data)
Use --dry-run to preview what will be cleared
Back up portfolio state before clearing Step 8
News articles (Step 3) may not be re-fetchable for old dates
